method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Change.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Change with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Changes within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The Change, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Change, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The Change, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Change, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Change in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Change in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Change in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Change with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the Change that follows the desired Change.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Change whose index follows the specified Change in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The Change whose index comes before the desired Change.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Change in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Change in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Change.
Returns the Change with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
